verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician בִּ֭נְגִינוֹת <S%H5058><s%> [TBin-gi-noton Neginoth עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית <S%H8067><s%> hash-she-mi-Nit, upon Sheminith מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- Nor בְּאַפְּךָ֥ <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-pe-Cha me not in thine anger תוֹכִיחֵ֑נִי <S%H3198><s%> to-chi-Che-ni; rebuke וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- Nor בַּחֲמָתְךָ֥ <S%H2534><s%> ba-cha-ma-te-Cha me in thy hot displeasure תְיַסְּרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3256><s%> te-yas-se-Re-ni. neither chasten

חָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> chon-ne-ni Have mercy יְהוָה֮ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֻמְלַ֫ל <S%H536><s%> 'um-Lal for I [am] weak אָ֥נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni I רְפָאֵ֥נִי <S%H7495><s%> re-fa-'E-ni heal יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נִבְהֲל֣וּ <S%H926><s%> niv-ha-Lu are vexed עֲצָמָֽי׃ <S%H6106><s%> 'a-tza-Mai. me for my bones

וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> Ve-naf-shi My soul נִבְהֲלָ֣ה <S%H926><s%> niv-ha-Lah vexed מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; is also sore; וְאַתְּ ve-'at כוְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you קיְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh but thou O LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מָתָֽי׃ <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai. long

שׁוּבָ֣ה <S%H7725><s%> shu-Vah Return יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD חַלְּצָ֣ה <S%H2502><s%> chal-le-Tzah deliver נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; my soul ה֝וֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <S%H3467><s%> ho-shi-'E-ni, oh save לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha. me for thy mercies'

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki For אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there בַּמָּ֣וֶת <S%H4194><s%> bam-Ma-vet For in death זִכְרֶ֑ךָ <S%H2143><s%> zich-Re-cha; [there is] no remembrance בִּ֝שְׁא֗וֹל <S%H7585><s%> bish-'ol, of thee in the grave מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi who יֽוֹדֶה־ <S%H3034><s%> yo-deh- who shall give thee thanks לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

יָגַ֤עְתִּי׀ <S%H3021><s%> ya-Ga'-ti I am weary בְּֽאַנְחָתִ֗י <S%H585><s%> be-'an-cha-Ti, with my groaning אַשְׂחֶ֣ה <S%H7811><s%> 'as-Cheh to swim בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol- Every לַ֭יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah all the night מִטָּתִ֑י <S%H4296><s%> mit-ta-Ti; make I my bed בְּ֝דִמְעָתִ֗י <S%H1832><s%> be-dim-'a-Ti, with my tears עַרְשִׂ֥י <S%H6210><s%> 'ar-Si my couch אַמְסֶֽה׃ <S%H4529><s%> 'am-Seh. I water

עָֽשְׁשָׁ֣ה <S%H6244><s%> 'a-she-Shah is consumed מִכַּ֣עַס <S%H3708><s%> mik-Ka-'as because of grief עֵינִ֑י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Ni; Mine eye עָֽ֝תְקָ֗ה <S%H6275><s%> 'a-te-Kah, it waxeth old בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol of all צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <S%H6887><s%> tzor-Rai. because of all mine enemies

ס֣וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> Su-ru Depart מִ֭מֶּנִּי <S%H4480><s%> Mi-men-ni at כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> Po-'a-lei from me all ye workers אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven; of iniquity כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' hath heard יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice בִּכְיִֽי׃ <S%H1065><s%> bich-Yi. of my weeping

שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma' hath heard יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD תְּחִנָּתִ֑י <S%H8467><s%> te-chin-na-Ti; my supplication יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti my prayer יִקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach. will receive

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ׀ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu be ashamed וְיִבָּהֲל֣וּ <S%H926><s%> ve-yib-ba-ha-Lu vexed מְ֭אֹד <S%H3966><s%> Me-'od and sore כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All אֹיְבָ֑י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai; Let all mine enemies יָ֝שֻׁ֗בוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shu-vu, let them return יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu [and] be ashamed רָֽגַע׃ <S%H7281><s%> Ra-ga'. suddenly
